title: Path Sum Equals Target
statement: Given a binary tree and a target sum, determine if the tree has a root-to-leaf path such that adding up all the values along the path equals the target.
input_format:
First line contains N and TARGET.
Second line contains N space-separated integers (-1 for null) representing level order.
output_format: Print 'YES' if such a path exists, otherwise 'NO'.
